resources.string:
This is a really basic heart beat monitor to give you results really fast.


There are two distinct pulses that come close together. If you feel both just press the button once. (Otherwise the estimate will flail around like a shirt caught in a car door.)


Measuring yourself and taping the screen is quite hard (it can be done). I suggest getting a friend to help you. - You can hold the device, and they can feel your pulse and tap the button with the other hand. 
Alternatively, my fiance came up with a really easy way to do it yourself. Use one hand to press the button and the other to measure your pulse on your neck. It's really easy!


Most measurements are variations of BMP (Beats Per Minute).


IMPORTANT 
Nothing in this app should be taken as medical advice. If you need medical advice or have any medical questions, please see your doctor.
